MonsterTrait.Name: Innate Spellcasting
MonsterTrait.Text:
The giant's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 15). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: detect magic, fog cloud, light
3/day each: featherfall, fly, misty step, telekinesis
1/day each: control weather, gaseous form

MonsterTrait.Name: Spellcasting
MonsterTrait.Text:
The giant is a 5th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 15, +7 to hit with spell attacks). The giant has the following bard spells prepared:
Cantrips (at will): minor illusion, prestidigitation, vicious mockery
1st level (4 slots): cure wounds, disguise self, silent image, Tashaâ€™s hideous laughter
2nd level (3 slots): invisibility, suggestion
3rd level (2 slots): major image, tongues

MonsterTrait.Name: Keen Smell
MonsterTrait.Text: The giant has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

MonsterTrait.Name: Multiattack
MonsterTrait.Text: The giant makes two attacks with its morningstar.

MonsterAction.Name: Morningstar
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +12 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 21 (3d8+8) bludgeoning damage. The attack deals an extra 14 (4d6) damage if the giant has advantage on the attack roll.

MonsterAction.Name: Rock
MonsterAction.Text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +12 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. Hit: 30 (4d10+8) bludgeoning damage. The attack deals an extra 14 (4d6) damage if the giant has advantage on the attack roll.

MonsterTrait.Name: Change Shape
MonsterTrait.Text: The giant magically polymorphs into a beast or humanoid it has seen, or back into its true form. Any equipment the giant is wearing or carrying is absorbed by the new form. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. It reverts to its true form if it dies.
